title: bcd-watch: New baselines (weekly)
description: A feed that summarizes changes to BCD weekly

items.content_html:
BCD New Baselines Report, Tue May 28 2024

Summary of Baseline changes
from Tue May 14 2024 18:33:28 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)
to Tue May 28 2024 12:28:46 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)

3 new Baseline implementations

css

  1. properties ➞ d  ➞  Added to Safari

api

  1. Element ➞ attachShadow ➞ options_delegatesFocus_parameter  ➞  Added to Firefox, Chrome, Safari
  2. Element ➞ checkVisibility ➞ options_opacityProperty_parameter  ➞  Added to Firefox, Chrome, Safari
